verses.name: 1 Kings 1:4
verses.text: And the damsel was very fair, and cherished the king, and ministered to him: but the king knew her not.

verses.name: 1 Kings 1:5
verses.text: Then Adonijah the son of Haggith exalted himself, saying, I will be king: and he prepared him chariots and horsemen, and fifty men to run before him.

verses.name: 1 Kings 1:6
verses.text: And his father had not displeased him at any time in saying, Why hast thou done so? and he also was a very goodly man; and his mother bare him after Absalom.

verses.name: 1 Kings 1:7
verses.text: And he conferred with Joab the son of Zeruiah, and with Abiathar the priest: and they following Adonijah helped him.
